definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :Is 10:14 egg (NH id., Ar. bayd.ah;un, Aram. [[בִּיעֲתָא]], biy9to0)—only Pl. [[בֵּיחִים]] De 22:6, De 22:6, Is 10:14; cstr. [[בֵּיחֵי]] Is 59:5; sf. [[בֵּיחֶיהָ]] Job 39:14, [[בֵּיחֵיהֶם]] Is 59:5; —eggs Is 10:14 (of small bird [[חפור]]) De 22:6, De 22:6, cf. Is 10:14 (in simil.); (of ostrich [[רננים]]) Job 39:14; (of great viper [[חפעוני]]) Is 59:5, Is 59:5 (metaph.)
